events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has a large scratch on the surface and seems faulty.
The issue was categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's report of damage and scratch.
The case was assigned to support agent Maria Gonzalez for further handling and response.
Hello! I'm Maria from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the damaged product you received.
Could you please send us photos of the scratch and the product's packaging so we can assess the damage?
Here are the photos showing the scratch and damaged box. I am really disappointed because I expected a flawless item.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement immediately and arrange a pickup of the damaged item at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to replace the product quickly. That would work for me.
We have processed your replacement order and scheduled a pickup for the damaged product. Thank you for your patience.
We hope the replacement product arrived in perfect condition. Please reach out if there is anything else we can assist with.
Closing this support case as resolved. Thank you for allowing us to correct the problem with your order.
